title: Bundle Hierarchy Edges
description: Parent-child relationships between bundles with enhanced metadata for hierarchy analysis.

parentPk.description: Stable PK of the parent bundle.

parentName.description: Name of the parent bundle (for readability and symmetric design).

childPk.description: Stable PK of the child bundle.

childIndex.description: Index of the child in the parent's child list. Preserves original order for BundlePath reconstruction.

childName.description: Name of the child bundle (for readability).

childBundleType.description: Type of the child bundle for quick type identification without additional lookups.

childDepth.description: Depth of the child bundle in the hierarchy tree (root = 0). Enables depth-based queries and hierarchy analysis.
